info.author: UNKNOWN
info.description:
Introduction
============

Installation
------------

Add collective.contentrules.talesaction to the 'egg' parameter of your buildout section ::

    [buildout]
    ...
    eggs +=
        ...
        collective.contentrules.talesaction

Or add it to the install_requires parameter of the setup.py of your module ::

    setup(
        ...
       install_requires=[
        ...
        'collective.contentrules.talesaction',
        ]

Then restart your buildout and your instance.

Use
---

Go to the `Rules` section of `Site configuration`.
You can now add `TALES Expression action` to the actions of your rules.
Changelog
=========

1.0 (2011-04-13)
----------------

- Initial release
info.name: collective.contentrules.talesaction
info.summary: An add-on to add TALES expression actions in your content rules

...

Or add it to the install_requires parameter of the setup.py of your module

setup(

   install_requires=[

Then restart your buildout and your instance.

Use

Go to the Rules section of Site configuration. You can now add TALES Expression action to the actions of your rules. Changelog =========
